Package it.polimi.LM39.model.excommunicationpermanenteffect

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CardActionMalus
    Used by 4 excommunications Each time you take a *cardType* Card (through the action space or as a Card effect), your action receives a *malus* reduction.
    DiceMalus
    Used by 1 excommunication All your colored Family Members receive a *malus* reduction of their value each time you place them.
    ExcommunicationPermanentEffect
    class (can't be abstract because RuntimeAdapterFactory needs a concrete class) that will be extended by all excommunication permanent effect
    HarvestProductionMalus
    Used by 2 excommunications Each time you perform a Harvest/Production action (through the action space or as a Card effect), decrease its value by *malus*.
    MalusForResources
    Used by 1 excommunication At the end of the game, you lose *victoryQty* Victory Point for *resourceQty* resource (wood, stone, coin, servant) in your supply on your Personal Board.
    MalusForResourcesCost
    Used by 1 excommunication At the end of the game, you lose *victoryQty* Victory Point for *resourceQty* wood and stone on your Building Cards’ costs.
    MalusVictoryForMilitary
    Used by 1 excommunication At the end of the game, you lose *victoryQty* Victory Point for *militaryQty* Military Point you have.
    MilitaryPointsMalus
    Used by 1 excommunication Each time you gain Military Points (from action spaces or from your Cards), gain *militaryQty* fewer Military Point.
    NoMarket
    Used by 1 excommunication You can’t place your Family Members in the Market action spaces.
    NoVictoryForCard
    Used by 3 excommunications At the end of the game, you don’t score points for any of your *cardType*
    ResourcesMalus
    Used by 3 excommunications Each time you receive wood or stone (from action spaces or from your Cards), you receive *resources* fewer wood or stone.
    ServantsMalus
    Used by 1 excommunication You have to spend *servantsQty* servants to increase your action value by 1
    SkipFirstTurn
    Used by 1 excommunication Each round, you skip your first turn.
    VictoryMalus
    Used by 1 excommunication At the end of the game, before the Final Scoring, you lose *victoryMalus* Victory Point for every *victoryQty* Victory Points you have.
